newsitem.title: UK: British Liberal Democrats demand handgun curbs.
newsitem.headline: British Liberal Democrats demand handgun curbs.

text.p: The Dunblane massacre prompted Britain's Liberal Democrats to demand heavy restrictions on the private ownership of handguns on Tuesday.
The party's annual conference voted for a ban on handguns except for small-calibre single-shot weapons kept at registered gun clubs. It narrowly rejected a near-total prohibition.
The motion also called for a ban on the sale of all weapons by mail order and for air weapons to be subject to licensing.

"To own a gun is not a right. It is a privilege given by society," home affairs spokesman Alex Carlile said. "And privileges can be revoked in the interest and safety of others." --London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
